products.name: Naruto Shippuden Master Museum Statue 1/4 Namikaze Minato 65 cm
products.description:
"I've got my own responsibilities, so I won't fall!"

Sideshow and HEX Collectibles present the Namikaze Minato Master Museum Statue in 1:4 scale from Naruto Shippuden. The statue measures 25.6" tall and features Minato in his glory days. For his performance during the Third Great Ninja War, Minato is renowned as Yellow Flash of the Leaf and chosen to become the Fourth Hokage.

Minato wears his iconic white hori sculpted with dynamic, windswept movement. He holds a Flying Thunder God kunai in the right hand straight ahead standing on the crushed stones, and gathers chakra in his left palm forming the powerful Rasengan. This well-picked posture presents the dynamic feeling to the character perfectly. The round pedestal is fully sculpted with the pattern of Eight Signed Seal and textures of the Nine Tails' body, implying the close connection between Minato and Kurama. Green moss, scattered leaves, and Kunai are interspersed on the trunk, branches, and gravel. All the details are added to the whole statue with a sense of realism.

Just like the brand concept of HEX Collectibles, our team has always looked at ways to push the boundary on design and capture the essence of each character we love. HEX Collectibles will continue to bring beloved characters to life with the distinguished dynamic design style.

Naruto Shippuden fans, don't miss your chance to add this Minato statue to your collection!

Size: 65 x 52 x 42 cm

Limited Edition of 800 pcs worldwide.

products.name: Naruto Shippuden Elite Dynamic Statue 1/6 Gaara vs Kimimaro 61 cm
products.description: HEX Collectibles is proud to present the Gaara vs Kimimaro Elite Dynamic Statue in an impressive 1:6 scale. The statue measures 24" tall and depicts the battle between Gaara and Kimimaro during the Sasuke Recovery Mission. Gaara, no longer the cold-blooded killer he once was, steps forward with a stern look, manipulating the sand to defend against Kimimaro's attack. Kimimaro's dark grey body is fully sculpted in the appearance of Second State, with realistic muscles and 6 large bone spines protruding from his back. He wields a spine whip and prepares to use his hardest bone spear to pierce through Gaara. The base of the statue depicts the surging sand, with several bone spikes emerging from different directions, adding a dynamic feeling to the overall design. This 1:6 scale statue perfectly integrates characters and scenes, bringing to life the classic battle with an exceptional level of detail. Naruto fans, don't miss your chance to add this Gaara vs Kimimaro statue to your collection today! Size: 61 x 51 x 48 cm Please note: Due to the size of this item, additional shipping costs may apply. Apart from your location, the actual package size and weight is needed to determine those costs. Both are unknown at this point and may not be available until the product arrives in our warehouse.

products.name: Naruto Shippuden Nendoroid PVC Action Figure Naruto Uzumaki 10 cm
products.description:
From the popular anime series "Naruto Shippuden" comes a rerelease of the Nendoroid of the main character, Naruto Uzumaki! Nendoroid designs are known to make the characters look younger than normal, but the confident expression of the grown-up Naruto has been faithfully captured in cute Nendoroid size!

Effect parts for both the Rasengan and Rasenshuriken are included to pose Naruto making use of two of his most memorable ninjutsu techniques, and both parts make use of a translucent material which make for a cute yet impressive appearance! Naruto can be posed holding the rasenshuriken as well as throwing it by making use of the special stand which allows it to be displayed floating high up in the air!

The hand seals used for his techniques have been adorably shrunk down into Nendoroid size, and the wrist parts are interchangeable which means you can make use of other hand parts to recreate different hand seals! In addition, a special illustrated sheet of the tailed beast 'Kurama' is included to display Naruto interacting with the powerful Nine-Tails!

The Nendoroid-style figure stands approx. 10 cm tall.

products.name: Naruto Shippuden Nendoroid PVC Action Figure Minato Namikaze 10 cm
products.description:
From the popular anime series "Naruto Shippuden" comes a Nendoroid of the Fourth Hokage Minato Namikaze! He comes with three face plates including a standard expression, a winking expression and a combat expression. Optional parts include his kunai and Rasengan. By combining his parts, you can create action-packed poses from the show, like his pose when starting Flying Thunder God Technique Level 2! Be sure to add him to your collection along with Nendoroid Naruto Uzumaki, also available for preorder now, and enjoy displaying them together!

It stands approx. 10 cm tall and comes with accessories and interchangeable parts in a window box.

products.name: Naruto Shippuden Nendoroid PVC Action Figure Sasuke Uchiha 10 cm
products.description:
From the popular anime series 'Naruto Shippuden' comes a Nendoroid Sasuke Uchiha! Sasuke's cool and composed appearance from the Shippuden series has been faithfully converted into Nendoroid size and he comes complete with three face plates including his standard expression, a Sharingan expression as well as a Mangekyou Sharingan expression!

Nendoroid Sasuke also comes with a selection of optional parts including his 'Chidori' ninjutsu parts to contrast with Naruto's Rasengan. A special illustration sheet featuring Sasuke's Susanoo together with effect parts to complete Sasuke's impressive appearance when he fully awakened his Mangekyou Sharingan are also included!!

From the popular anime series "Naruto Shippuden" comes a Nendoroid of Kakashi Hatake from his time in the Anbu Black Ops! He comes with two interchangeable face plates-a standard face plate and a glaring face plate. His fox mask is also removable.
